text: County Mayo is a county in the province of Connacht, in Ireland. Castlebar and Ballina are the two towns with the most people living in them in the county. The highest point in Mayo and Connacht is Mweelrea. ==Towns and villages== The following is a list of the towns and villages in County Mayo: *Achill Island *Balla, Ballina, Ballinrobe, Ballintober, Ballycastle, Ballyhaunis, Ballyglass, Ballyvary, Bangor, Belmullet, Bohola *Castlebar, Charlestown, Claremorris, Cong, Crossmolina *Derrew *Foxford *Geesala *Keel, Kilkelly, Killala, Kiltimagh, Knock *Louisburgh *Mayo, Mulrany *Newport *Swinford *Tourmakeady *Westport ==Other websites== *Mayo County Council's website *Map of Mayo Category:Gaeltacht
title: County Mayo
